content: you come up with with 1 or more bokky squares please tag me as @bokkyshome and use #bokkysquare when you share your make on social media to be sure that i get to admire your work © bokky square by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 11 below you see how the pattern in the corners create a round motif when more squares come together if you are familiar with tapestry you might want to try using 2 pa%ern colors instead of just 1 below you see what happens if you use a 2nd pa%ern color for the snakes a lot of time and effort was put into designing and writing this pattern this pattern is for personal use only finished items may be sold but please be sure to mention @bokkyshome as the designer you are not allowed to share and/or distribute this pattern or any part of it as your own you are not allowed to copy film or use any part of this pattern as your own © bokky square by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 12 add-on here is a chart for bokky square 2 0 the wri%en pa%ern for rounds 1-15 of the original bokky square can be used for this square too i used this pa%ern for 1 side of my bokky pillow there is no limit to the size of this square so i just kept adding bokky s hll the shtchcount of this 1 square matched the shtchcount of 4 combined original bokky squares as you can see in the photos below © bokky square by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 13
